title: Lithium battery with composite solid electrolyte

events.title: Application filed by Robert Bosch GmbH

classifications.description: Accumulators with non-aqueous electrolyte characterised by the materials used as electrolytes, e.g. mixed inorganic/organic electrolytes
Rocking-chair batteries, i.e. batteries with lithium insertion or intercalation in both electrodes; Lithium-ion batteries
Hybrid cells; Manufacture thereof composed of a half-cell of a fuel-cell type and a half-cell of the secondary-cell type
Separators, membranes or diaphragms characterised by the material having a layered structure
Separators, membranes or diaphragms characterised by their combination with electrodes
Composites in the form of mixtures
Manufacturing or production processes characterised by the final manufactured product
Energy storage systems for electromobility, e.g. batteries

abstract: An electrochemical cell in one embodiment includes a negative electrode including a form of lithium, a positive electrode spaced apart from the negative electrode, a separator positioned between the negative electrode and the positive electrode, and a first lithium ion conducting and ionically insulating composite solid electrolyte layer positioned between the negative electrode and the positive electrode.
claims: 2. electrochemical cell according to claim 1, wherein the first lithium ion conduction and ion insulation are multipleClosing solid electrolyte layer is located between positive electrode and dividing plate.

3. electrochemical cell according to claim 1, wherein the first lithium ion conduction and ion insulation are multipleClosing solid electrolyte layer is located between negative electrode and dividing plate.

4. electrochemical cell according to claim 3, also comprises and being located between positive electrode and dividing plateThe second lithium ion conduction and ion insulated compound solid electrolyte layer.

5. electrochemical cell according to claim 3, wherein the first lithium ion conduction and ion insulation are multipleClosing solid electrolyte comprises:
      Lithium conducting polymer layer; With
      Full compact lithium conducting shell.

6. electrochemical cell according to claim 5, wherein full compact lithium conducting shell comprises:
      Full compact lithium conductive ceramic.

7. electrochemical cell according to claim 5, wherein full compact lithium conducting shell comprises:
      Full compact lithium conductive glass.

8. electrochemical cell according to claim 5, wherein:
      Lithium conducting polymer layer has the thickness between 1 nanometer and 50 microns; And
      Full compact lithium conducting shell has the thickness between 1 nanometer and 50 microns.

9. electrochemical cell according to claim 8, wherein:
      Lithium conducting polymer layer has the thickness between 200 nanometers and 10 microns; And
      Full compact lithium conducting shell has the thickness between 1 nanometer and 1 micron.

10. electrochemical cell according to claim 8, wherein:
      Lithium conducting polymer layer comprises polyethylene glycol oxide (PEO), there is PEOLi conduction mutually and polystyrene highThe block copolymer of modulus of shearing phase, Li conduction garnet, Li conduction sulfide, Li3N、Li3P and LiPONIn one or more; And
      Full compact lithium conducting shell comprises LiPON, Li3N、Li3P, Li conduction garnet, Li conduct sulfideWith one or more in Li conduction phosphate.

11. 1 kinds form the method for electrochemical cell, comprising:
      Comprising grid spacer between a kind of negative electrode of lithium of form and positive electrode; With
      Between negative electrode and positive electrode, locate the first lithium ion conduction and ion insulated compound solid electrolyte layer.

12. methods according to claim 11, wherein locate the first lithium ion conduction and ion insulation is multipleClosing solid electrolyte layer comprises:
      Between positive electrode and dividing plate, locate the first lithium ion conduction and ion insulated compound solid electrolyte layer.

13. methods according to claim 11, wherein locate the first lithium ion conduction and ion insulation is multipleClosing solid electrolyte layer comprises:
      Between negative electrode and dividing plate, locate the first lithium ion conduction and ion insulated compound solid electrolyte layer.

14. methods according to claim 13, also comprise:
      Between positive electrode and dividing plate, locate the second lithium ion conduction and ion insulated compound solid electrolyte layer.

15. methods according to claim 13, wherein locate the first lithium ion conduction and ion insulation is multipleClosing solid electrolyte layer comprises:
      Between negative electrode and dividing plate, location has the first lithium of lithium conducting polymer layer and full compact lithium conducting shellIonic conduction and ion insulated compound solid electrolyte layer.

16. methods according to claim 15, wherein locate the first lithium ion conduction and ion insulation is multipleClosing solid electrolyte layer comprises:
      Full compact lithium conductive ceramic.

17. methods according to claim 15, wherein full compact lithium conducting shell comprises:
      It is exhausted that between negative electrode and dividing plate, location has the first lithium ion conduction and the ion of full compact lithium conducting shellEdge composite solid electrolyte layer.

18. methods according to claim 15, wherein:
      Lithium conducting polymer layer has the thickness between 1 nanometer and 50 microns; And
      Full compact lithium conducting shell has the thickness between 1 nanometer and 50 microns.

19. methods according to claim 18, wherein:
      Lithium conducting polymer layer has the thickness between 200 nanometers and 10 microns; And
      Full compact lithium conducting shell has the thickness between 1 nanometer and 1 micron.

20. methods according to claim 18, wherein:
      Lithium conducting polymer layer comprises polyethylene glycol oxide (PEO), there is PEOLi conduction mutually and polystyrene highThe block copolymer of modulus of shearing phase, Li conduction garnet, Li conduction sulfide, Li3N、Li3P and LiPONIn one or more; And
      Full compact lithium conducting shell comprises LiPON, Li3N、Li3P, Li conduction garnet, Li conduct sulfideWith one or more in Li conduction phosphate.
